overview: When you're a teenager, there's nothing better than having your house released to gather friends when your parents travel, isn't it? That was the luck of Leandra, who reunited her friends for a girl-only night. What she didn't expect was for her brother to have the same idea, and bring his friends to a boys' night, putting everything to lose. Now who will win this duel between boys and girls?
title: Proibido Para Meninos
